name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon product research tool for sellers - Infinity

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon product research tool: Keepa Analytics, real-time updates, profit calculator, & category insights. Dominate the marketplace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you looking for an accessible tool that can help you source a product on Amazon? Our product research tool - Infinity - is the perfect solution to ease your worries.  

 AMZ Online Arbitrage product research tool provides a comprehensive solution for efficient market research, offering various metrics at one place, empowering the decisions for a seller. 

Features:  

-> Detailed description of multiple product IDs/ASINs provided simultaneously.  

-> Easy access to FBA/FBM calculator. 

-> History of an ASIN/product ID can be viewed. 

-> Offers for a product ID/ASIN can be viewed easily. 

-> Provides variations for a product ID/ASIN.  

-> Keepa graph – price tracking analytics – shows the price history of an ASIN. 

-> Availability on search, single product and Amazon storefront page. 

-> You can shortlist the product IDs and store them in notes/sheets. 

-> Product ID/ASIN can be segregated using tags. 

-> Global Marketplace shows where a product ID/ASIN can be sourced globally. 

-> Product research tool theme mode can be changed to dark/light. 

Metrics provided: 

AMZ Online Arbitrage product research tool provides the below metrics: 

Product Information - A detailed description of the ASIN/Product ID is provided in the tool, such as, the seller can view the category, UPC number, variations, IP claims, Amazon Shares Buy box details, profitability, offers, gated/ungated and many more.  

Historical data - Provides the history of an ASIN/Product ID for a period, ranging from 30-90 days. It shows details like Buy Box Rate, BSR, Lowest Buy Box, OOS%, Offers & Sold History, Average Sales Drop and Estimated sales. It also shows the time when the product ID/ASIN was listed and its expiration date. Apart from that, the price range for FBA and the average price review of the ASIN can be accessed. 

FBA/FBM calculator – The product research tool helps to calculate the profitability of an ASIN/Product ID seamlessly. You can toggle between FBA/FBM and get the price in an instant, with the added advantage of choosing the discount too.  

Offers – The product research tool provides details of product IDs/ASINs that are currently on offer in just a few clicks. The Offers category shows if the seller is an FBA/FBM seller, the price range of product ID/ASIN, the stock and profit of an ASIN, and the number of times a product ID/ASIN is listed/reviewed.  

Variations – The product research tool eases the work of an Amazon seller, by providing variations of a product ID/ASIN, within the tool itself. Toggling between FBM/FBA, the seller can view products that are like each other. 

Keepa graph - An integrated price tracking analytics, it shows the price history of the product ID/ASIN. It helps to also check on the status of various factors like buy box, sales rank, ratings, reviews etc. 

Source & Notes – Using the product research tool, the seller can shortlist their preferred ASINs as notes for future reference. They can also mark down the source of their product IDs through this tool easily.  

Tags & Sheets – The seller can identify his product IDs/ASINs by attaching unique tags, which will help in future use. These tags can be synched seamlessly to their Emails, for easy access, anytime. 

Global Marketplace – A prime factor while sourcing a product ID/ASIN, the global marketplace Check helps sellers to locate product sourcing at a global range. The check will provide the BSR, ROI, price and profit of an ASIN/Product ID. 

How to install? 

-> Download and install AMZ Online Arbitrage product research tool – Infinity - free from Chrome Web Store.  

-> The research tool seamlessly integrates in the browser. 

-> Enable the product research tool by logging in with Email ID 

-> Now browse through the Amazon Category Page. 

-> You will be able to view details of multiple ASINs/product IDs simultaneously.  

-> Now open the Single Product page of any product. 

-> The product research tool will provide all details of the ASIN instantly.   

Download now our AMZ Online Arbitrage product research tool and revolutionize your Amazon selling strategy.
